name: What if... Giant Laser Wasps!?
description:
Created for DMSPILJAM November 2021 with the theme "Hvad nu hvis" ("What if").

Fly around and destroy as much as possible before dying.

===Controls===
Use WASD and The mouse to aim and shoot lasers.

===Assets===
Almost all of the art was downloaded from google, except for the backgrounds.

Music downloaded from https://n91.itch.io/destruction
Sound effects generated with https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

I joined the jam rather late with around 10 hours before the deadline, but it was definetly a fun challenge.
